transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 你好! 我是小美。让我们学习如何解释作业问题。

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: Say: 'I'm having difficulty understanding this concept'

transcript.speaker: child
transcript.content: I'm having difficulty understanding this concept

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 太棒了! Asking for help shows you care about learning!

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: You can also say: 'Could you help me with this homework, please?'

transcript.speaker: child
transcript.content: Could you help me with this homework, please?

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 好棒! Teachers love helping students who ask nicely!
